TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HandleProcessCorruptedStateExceptionsAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 啟用 Managed 程式碼，以處理表示處理序損毀狀態的例外狀況。

span.span: Enables managed code to handle exceptions that indicate a corrupted process state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 損毀處理序狀態的例外狀況會指出處理序狀態已損毀的例外狀況。Corrupted process state exceptions are exceptions that indicate that the state of a process has been corrupted. 我們不建議在此狀態下執行您的應用程式。We do not recommend executing your application in this state. 根據預設，common language runtime (CLR) 不會傳遞這些例外狀況給 managed 程式碼，而`try` / `catch`區塊 （和其他例外狀況處理子句） 不會叫用它們。By default, the common language runtime (CLR) does not deliver these exceptions to managed code, and the `try`/`catch` blocks (and other exception-handling clauses) are not invoked for them. 如果您不確定您想要維護您處理這些例外狀況，您必須套用屬性設定為您想要執行其例外狀況處理子句的方法。If you are absolutely sure that you want to maintain your handling of these exceptions, you must apply the attribute to the method whose exception-handling clauses you want to execute. CLR 會損毀處理序的狀態例外狀況傳遞至方法中，兩者都適用的 exception 子句和屬性。The CLR delivers the corrupted process state exception to applicable exception clauses only in methods that have both the and attributes. 您也可以加入[ \](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/legacycorruptedstateexceptionspolicy-element.md)至您的應用程式組態檔的項目。You can also add the [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/legacycorruptedstateexceptionspolicy-element.md) element to your application's configuration file. 這可確保損毀的狀態例外狀況會傳遞至您的例外狀況處理常式，而不需要或屬性。This will ensure that corrupted state exceptions are delivered to your exception handlers without the or attribute. 這個組態項目有之前的版本中已編譯的應用程式不會影響[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]中執行，但[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]或更新版本時，損毀的狀態例外狀況將會繼續傳遞這些應用程式。This configuration element has no effect on applications that were compiled in versions previous to the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] but are running in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or later; corrupted state exceptions will continue to be delivered for those applications. 屬性時，會忽略發生在部分信任或不透明的程式碼，因為受信任的主機應該允許未受信任增益集來攔截並忽略這些嚴重的例外狀況。The attribute is ignored when it is encountered in partially trusted or transparent code, because a trusted host should not allow an untrusted add-in to catch and ignore these serious exceptions. 如需有關損毀處理序狀態的例外狀況的詳細資訊，請參閱文章[處理損毀狀態例外狀況](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=179681)CLR Inside Out 部落格中。For more information about corrupted process state exceptions, see the entry [Handling Corrupted State Exceptions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=179681) in the CLR Inside Out blog.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
